item.description: This is a great way to just hang out and relax after a busy week!  We’ll have a variety of delicious pizzas, salad, and dessert.   D ress casual.  Admission $15.   To reserve, call Elaine 860-658-6706.   Directions to 126 Hopmeadow Street, Unit 6D:   I-84 Exit 39 (Rt. 4), turn right onto Rt. 10, go about 6 miles to Rt. 44W, turn left about 1 mile, turn right onto Rt. 10, go 1.7 miles (becomes Hopmeadow Street), take right at Bidwell’s into Talcott Acres, go to stop, bear left, 1st unit on right is 6D.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Pizza Party
